item.description:
@sir_pk_p00n wrote:

add it in boolean process -.-

[code]if (combat >= 3 && combat <= 50) {
Fool = true;
} else if (combat < 3) {
noob = true;
}

else if (combat >= 51 && combat <= 100) {
Knight = true;
} else if (Combat >= 1 && combat <= 50) {
Fool = true;
}

else if (combat >= 100 && combat <= 126) {
Hero = true;
} else if (combat >= 51 && combat <= 100) {
Knight = true;
} else if (combat >= 1 && combat <= 50) {
Fool = true;
}[/code]
